text:
Long gone are the days where the only reason you'd wear yoga pants is to do, you know, yoga.

Yoga pants have worked their way into the athleisure and just straight leisure world by storm, and for good reason—they offer a stylish look for any body type, are one of the most flattering workout clothes options, can be versatile enough to wear both on and off the yoga mat, and most importantly, they’re crazy comfortable.

When shopping for the best yoga pants, consider their purpose in your life. If you plan on sporting them to your next gym sesh or hot yoga class, look for pairs made with performance-ready fabrics that’ll keep you cool during the sweatiest workouts. Or if you prefer something that you can lounge in at home, opt for cotton yoga pants that’ll feel soft and comfortable enough for everyday wear.

Now that this style has become so popular, there are tons of different yoga pants for women out there to choose from. So to help you sift through the seemingly endless options of the most flattering workout clothes, we’ve compiled a list of 16 of our favorite pairs below, from a variety of brands and price points. And while you’ve probably heard about the Lululemon yoga pants and leggings that have gained a cult following, these top-notch picks boast all of the same features—but at lower prices.

Whether you’re a seasoned yogi looking for performance-ready yoga pants with pockets for your next Bikram class, or a casual wearer looking for seamless and flattering high-waisted yoga pants to wear while running errands, you’ll find what works for you here. And the best part is the majority of these options can double as maternity yoga pants thanks to their stretchy material and flexible, comfortable fit. (Related: Cute Maternity Workout Clothes You'll Actually Want to Wear While Pregnant)

Here, browse the best yoga pants for women that aren’t Lululemon, but offer all the same features—like a flattering fit and stylish, versatile look that can be paired with any outfit.
title: The Best Yoga Pants That Aren’t Lululemon

meta_data.description: Comfortable, flattering, and versatile, these affordable, cheap yoga pants from brands like Alo Yoga, Gaiam, and Onzie are the athleisure staples you need in your closet. Plus, learn how to find the most flattering workout clothes for your figure.

og.title: The Best Yoga Pants that Aren't Lululemon
og.description: All as functional on the mat as they are stylish off of it.
